sourcesContent:
import { Container } from '../../style'; const TipsToGetMoreEnrollments = () => { return (

Experiment with your classes

Feel free to experiment with your classes with different titles, age ranges, duration, etc. This also includes your teaching strategies, content, and type of class. It will also be helpful if you keep a record of the number of enrollees for each of your classes to easily compare different approaches.

 

Share your classes

You can also expand the reach of your classes by sharing your classes on different social media such as Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, etc.

 

Respond quickly to inquiries

Your classes have a “Send Message” button that allows parents and learners to contact you even before enrolling in your class. Try to be responsive and as clear as possible when answering their questions or concerns.

 

Experiment with class pricing

Lower pricing for your classes will result in a higher number of enrollments. Of course, lowering the price too much will also reduce your potential profits. Feel free to experiment with different pricing with your classes to see which price ranges work best.

 

Invite people to follow Tagpros

On our social media accounts, we try to promote classes and partner teachers in our posts to enhance their reach. You can share our social media accounts for{' '}

other people to see and also share our posts about your new projects. Here are our social media accounts:

  • Facebook
  • Linkedin
  • Twitter
  • Youtube
); }; export default TipsToGetMoreEnrollments;
